p: Pomelo ( Citrus grandis Osbeck), one of the three primordial citrus species, is consumed worldwide and used as a traditional medicine in China and Southeast Asia. Pomelo essential oil has a characteristic odor, and it has numerous applications in fragrant, aromatherapeutic, spiritual and cosmetic fields. 1 Pomelo essential oil is also suggested to have a broad spectrum of pharmacological activities such as antioxidation, inhibition of microbes, 2â€“4 antimelanogenesis, 5 and be used in as an alternative therapy for cough, ulcer, swelling, and epilepsy. 6
